name: Robert Chen
message: Great article! I live in Chicago and have seen many of these filming locations. The Board of Trade building is especially impressive.

name: Sarah Wilson
message: I'm planning a trip to Chicago next month. This guide will be super helpful for my film location tour!

name: David Thompson
message: You missed the location where they filmed scenes from The Fugitive! The old Cook County Hospital (now called Stroger) is iconic.
